thread.title: In pictures: there’s a huge neon sculpture at Tate Britain
thread.title_full: In pictures: there’s a huge neon sculpture at Tate Britain

author: Staff Writer
title: In pictures: there’s a huge neon sculpture at Tate Britain
text:
By Eddy Frankel Posted: Monday March 27 2017, 3:20pm Joe Humphrys Cerith Wyn Evans, Tate Britain, Duveens Commission, March 2017 
Get ready to have your eyeballs seared to a crisp, because Cerith Wyn Evans’s amazing new Duveen Galleries commission at Tate Britain is a wild ocular ride. Comprising 2km of neon tubing, the piece starts as a calm, simple loop of light before erupting into total chaos. It’s open now and it’s great. A LIGHT LUNCH Mar 27, 2017 at 4:34am PDT
